title: Gun Control Talk, Vasectomies and March Madness, Bucket Fed, The Secret and more
itunes:title: Gun Control Talk, Vasectomies and March Madness, Bucket Fed, The Secret and more
description:
Today was intense in terms of Gun Control Talk. As always The Nephew cuts it close and shows you why he is "The King of Pranks" with Adoption Agency. Last but certainly not least, Uncle Steve drops a gem with his Closing Remarks. "Live Your Life in Expectation!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
